project: AI-Powered Community Waste Sorting and Recycling Optimization Workflow
description: A workflow leveraging AI to enhance community waste sorting and recycling processes for improved efficiency and sustainability.

dataCollection.description: Collect waste data from community bins using sensors and cameras.
methods: IoT sensors for fill levels and contamination detection
Computer vision cameras for image capture
dataCollection.output: Raw waste images and sensor data

dataProcessing.description: Process collected data to identify waste categories and contamination.
methods: Object detection models for waste classification
dataProcessing.output: Classified and clean waste data with contamination flags

sortingRecommendation.description: AI-driven recommendation for optimal sorting and routing of waste.
methods: Machine learning models to determine sorting priorities
Optimization algorithms for routing waste to recycling centers
sortingRecommendation.output: Sorting instructions and optimal recycling center routes

communityEngagement.description: Engage community with actionable feedback and incentives.
methods: Mobile app notifications with sorting tips
Gamification and reward system for improved compliance
communityEngagement.output: User engagement data and improved sorting behavior

reportingAndAnalytics.description: Generate reports on waste trends and recycling efficiency.
methods: Trend analysis and environmental impact assessment
reportingAndAnalytics.output: Periodic reports and insights for stakeholders

software: Cloud services for data storage and processing
